QuestData.Title: Mission: The Abyssal Shelf
QuestData.Description: Now that you've got your wings, perhaps you'd be interested in running another bombing mission?$B$BThis time we've isolated the Legion's main production area, behind the forge camps to the north. I need you to get on a gryphon and destroy the whole damned thing!$B$BHere are your bombs - now, talk to Gryphoneer Windbellow when you're ready for takeoff.
QuestData.LogDescription: Wing Commander Gryphongar at Shatter Point in Hellfire Peninsula has asked that you destroy 20 Gan'arg Peons, 5 Mo'arg Overseers and 5 Fel Cannons.
QuestData.CompletionText: Show them that not even the skies are safe!
QuestData.RewardText: You fly as if you've been doing this your entire life, $n. Outstanding performance out there! Not even a scratch on the gryphon destroyers!
